name: Patryk Zaslawski
role_name: Python Developer with Machine Learning Focus
profile_summary: As a detail-oriented and self-starter Python Developer with a focus on Machine Learning, I bring over 8 years of experience in backend development and AI automation. Proficient in **Python** and its frameworks including **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, I excel at creating high-performance solutions that leverage machine learning technologies and cloud platforms such as **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. I have a strong foundation in **testing** methodologies to ensure code quality and reliability in every deployment. My expertise also encompasses modern frontend technologies like **React**, **Angular**, and **Vue**, ensuring a full-stack approach to application development. With robust organizational skills and a growth mindset, I thrive in collaborative environments focused on delivering enterprise-grade solutions.

experience.role: Python Developer with Machine Learning Focus
experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to develop and optimize machine learning algorithms, enhancing predictive capabilities in healthcare applications, while reducing processing time by **30%**.
Implemented backend services using **AWS** and **Azure** cloud platforms, facilitating scalable deployment and high availability solutions, decreasing downtime by **25%**.
Designed and executed data pipelines leveraging **GCP** to efficiently process and analyze large datasets, achieving a **50%** improvement in data ingestion and transformation times.
Executed comprehensive testing using CI/CD practices, employing frameworks such as PyTest and unittest, ensuring a **90%** test coverage for robust application performance.
Led and mentored a cross-functional team on backend development strategies using **Python**, fostering a collaborative environment that improved project delivery times by **20%**.
Streamlined communication processes within teams using agile methodologies, enhancing team organization and project tracking effectively.
Maintained a detail-oriented approach to improving code quality and implementation of best practices within the development workflows, leading to increased team productivity.
Promoted continuous learning by sharing insights into the latest advancements in **AI Automation**, ensuring the team stayed updated with emerging technologies in the field.
Developed APIs and microservices that integrated machine learning models into existing systems, optimizing service operations for end-users through real-time data processing and AI features.

• Leveraged **Python** to build scalable backend systems focusing on **Machine Learning** capabilities and AI automation through integration with **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services.
• Developed and maintained **Python** microservices, implementing automated testing frameworks to ensure consistent quality and performance.
• Utilized **GCP** for data analysis and machine learning model deployment to enhance backend processes, achieving processing speeds of up to **50%** faster than previous implementations.
• Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using **Python** ensuring secure communication and data transactions, handling over **10,000** requests per minute.
• Managed cloud deployments through **Azure** to enhance system reliability, achieving an uptime of **99.95%** across services.
• Employed **AWS Lambda** for serverless architecture, streamlining ETL processes and reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Collaborated on cross-functional teams to ensure integration of AI automation within applications, contributing to improved decision-making processes.
• Maintained detailed documentation of all processes, enhancing organizational skills and communication within the team.
• Demonstrated aptitude for detail-oriented tasks, refining algorithms and data processing methodologies to improve output accuracy by **25%**.
• Engaged in continuous learning and adaptation, showcasing a growth mindset by mastering new technologies and methodologies in backend development.

Developed and optimized backend services using **Python** for e-commerce platforms, incorporating **Machine Learning** techniques for enhanced personalization and user experience.
Designed, implemented, and improved machine learning models within backend systems, increasing recommendation accuracy by **30%** and enhancing customer engagement.
Leveraged cloud services like **GCP**, **AWS**, and **Azure** to deploy scalable machine learning solutions, achieving a **99.9%** uptime for critical services.
Created robust RESTful APIs in **Python** to facilitate high-volume transactions, ensuring seamless interactions with frontend systems and handling **over 10,000** requests per minute.
Utilized **SQLAlchemy** and other Python ORMs with databases like **PostgreSQL**, **SQL Server**, and **MySQL** to manage and optimize transactional data, improving query performance by **25%**.
Automated testing and deployment processes with **CI/CD pipelines** using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, reducing deployment times by **50%** and ensuring consistent feature delivery.
Containerized applications using **Docker**, enabling efficient scalability across various environments and reducing deployment discrepancies by **40%**.
Integrated machine learning models with real-time data streams using **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**, facilitating immediate updates and decision-making across applications.
Developed complex backend functionality while prioritizing data integrity and error handling, ensuring high system reliability and availability.
Implemented comprehensive testing strategies, including unit and integration tests with **PyTest** and automated UI tests using **Selenium**, which contributed to a **30%** decrease in production bugs.
Conducted performance testing and optimizations with tools like **Apache JMeter** and **Locust**, identifying and resolving bottlenecks to handle peak traffic loads with ease.
Ensured secure API authentication and authorization using **OAuth 2.0**, maintaining compliance with best practices and delivering a secure user experience.
Created data visualization dashboards using **Grafana** for monitoring system performance and machine learning insights, improving visibility for stakeholders.
Maintained clear and organized documentation of development processes and model performance, enabling better communication within teams and adherence to organizational standards.

skills:
**Programming Languages:**
	Python

**Backend Frameworks:**
	FastAPI, Django, Flask, Spring Boot

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	Angular (1–16), React (15–18), Next.js, Vue.js (2/3), Blazor

**API Technologies:**
	REST & gRPC APIs

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3), Azure (App Services, Blob, SQL), GCP

**Databases:**
	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), Redis, SQLAlchemy

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS, Azure

**Other:**
	Machine Learning, AI Automation, Testing, Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot, Communication, Detail-oriented, Organizational Skills, Self-starter, Growth Mindset
